parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.64

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns value of the given sound controller.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''getSoundController''' controller
</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - must be a vehicle (does not work on soldiers)
</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> controller: [[String]] - name of sound controller, for example "rpm" or "thrust".
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[getSoundController]] "rpm"; //600</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Sound]], [[getAllSoundControllers]], [[getSoundControllerResult]], [[getEnvSoundController]], [[getAllEnvSoundControllers]], [[getCustomSoundController]], [[setCustomSoundController]], [[getCustomSoundControllerCount]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description"></root>
